markdownRemark.html:
PixelPlayers is a unique collection of animated 8-bit famous soccer players. The art for this project is crafted by several artists, so this collection has different styles in art & animation.

The rarity of cards are divided into two groups: Rare: Animated art of a legend soccer player. Legendary: Animated art of a legend soccer player performing a historical feat.

We will give away world cup ball NFTs to our devoted fans.

Get it on Hicetnunc
